summary: This mod add Sierra - Storm Mage
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w422/Den987/ScreenShot867.png[/IMG]
============
[color=grey]DESCRIPTION[/color]
============
This mod add Sierra - Storm Mage
She can conjure Storm Atronach and fight by Shock Magic
Marryable , Essential , Frost Magic , Auto-level
Age 20 , Young Voice
[color=grey]You can find her in Nightgate Inn[/color]
I hope you like it

=============
[color=grey]RECOMMENDED[/color]
=============
Better Female by Bella
CBBE

=============
[color=grey]REQUIRED[/color]
=============
Apachii Sky Hair Female 1.0


=============
[color=grey]INSTALLATION [/color]
=============
Setup all files to your data folder

=============
[color=grey]UNINSTALLATION[/color]
=============
Delete bsa and esp files
_______________________

[color=grey]CREDITS:[/color]
Apachii for Apachii Sky Hair used in this mod[/center]
author: Den987
